name: Wind Demon
description: The Wind Demon is a small, chaotic fiend distinguished by its exceptional agility and sinister appearance. It moves with a natural grace in the air, reflecting its malign nature.
memorable: Its Arrow Bane ability complicates ranged encounters, reflecting attacks back at shooters, turning them vulnerable to their own strikes.
goals: To serve as a menace in combat, sowing chaos among opponents.
relations: Related to other fiendish creatures of chaos, possibly serving greater fiend lords or existing as a tormentor.
environment: Often found in dark, chaotic locations that align with the nature of chaotic fiends.
strengths: High dexterity enables it to evade attacks and perform stealth effectively; has magic resistance.
weaknesses: Low hit points make it vulnerable to concentrated damage despite its evasive tactics.
attacks: Multiattack using frost claws, dealing slashing and cold damage, along with its ability to reflect ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Arrow Bane allows it to complicate ranged attacks and turn them against the attacker.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 60 feet, enabling it to see in darkness as if it were dim light.
skills: Proficient in stealth with a +8 bonus, making it very effective at remaining undetected.
additional_information: Immune to cold and poison damage.
Resistant to fire and lightning damage.
Ability to move after taking damage without provoking opportunity attacks.
test_queries: small demon that reflects ranged attacks
agile creature immune to cold and poison
wind creature that creates chaos in battles
